author: fschumacher
msg: Bug 57394: When constructing an instance using ClassTools#construct(String, int),
the int parameter was not used, but the default constructor was used instead.
Added a few test cases to test the methods of ClassTools and correct the unused parameter.
The only place in jmeter, where this method was called is in the JMeter class itself and
is used, when the property "mirror.server.port" is set to a value greater than zero.
Without this patch that value would be ignored.

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed a bug in UtilDateTime.java where SimpleDateFormat instances were not initialized with the locale.

author: stefan2
msg: On the fsx-id branch:  Begin using our own dirent type within FSX.
There a number of reasons to do this:
- Decouple the implementation from the interface definition.
- Allow for getting rid of the svn_fs_id_t member within the struct
while most times we would only need the dirents within FSX itself.
- Reduce the typical size of a dirent from 88 to 48 bytes under 64 bits.
Compared to FSFS' 120 bytes, this grows RAM / cache capacity 2.5x.
- Eliminate ID construction and conversion overhead.
This patch will simply introduce dirent_t as a copy of svn_fs_dirent_t
and use it throughout FSX.  Convert at the interface.  Most of it is
(x_dir_entries): Convert from the internal dirent type to the FS API type.
